\n<Yoinara>I felt a gaze from behind and turned around.

\n<Yoinara>The third floor was home to the library,
and a set of classrooms used by
the student council and other clubs.
With the low number of students here,
there seemed to be many unused ones.
\n<Yoinara>I want to say someone mentioned a time
when the first, second, and third floors
all had classrooms for each grade.
this school still has a fair selection
\n<Yoinara>I felt like someone had just said my name.
\n<Yoinara>I rolled up my sleeve to check my arm.
There wasn't any sign of a handprint on it.
I'd just made eye contact with something.
\n<Yoinara>But all that was in front of me
was my shadow, facing opposite me.
about the room since I'd left it.
